Posts.Content: Oh yes, I believe in God.  I'm a Roman Catholic.  Can't say I'm overly religious.  Hey, I've sinned many times over.  I do believe in a loving God.  I'm blessed with a husband and son.  My son is an officer in the Air Force.  He and my wonderful daughterin law have two beautiful little boys.  I also have four Whippets.  My dogs are a great comfort to me.  I'm also surrounded with many praying, caring friends.   Thank you for touching my life gently with your response.  Yes, please do pray for me.
Posts.Title: alone

Posts.Content: I found out last week that I have cancer.  I'm so scared.  I worry about my soul.  I've been a smoker for many years and one of my biggest fears is that they will find cancer all through my body.  I also feal completely alone.
Posts.Title: alone

Posts.Content: The doctor said it was ductile cancer.  He has not mentioned chemo.  He has mentioned radiation.  I'm so blessed to have a loving family, friends and pets.  It's just that I'm so scared.  I still have a lot of love, compassion and friendship to give to my fellow human beings.  I guess I'm just confused and scared.
Posts.Title: alone
